content.text: Now I'll create the educational book reading app with all the features you requested. Let me start by updating the styles for a light theme and then create the necessary components and screens.

>

Perfect! I've created a comprehensive educational book reading app with all the features you requested. Here's what I've built:

## 🚀 **Features Implemented:**

### **Core Features:**
- **Home Screen** with curated book collection organized by categories
- **Book Reading Screen** with adjustable font sizes and clean, distraction-free interface  
- **Search Functionality** to find books by title, author, or topics
- **Library Screen** to track reading progress and completed books

### **Design Elements:**
- **Light Theme** with clean, readable typography using Open Sans font
- **Modern UI** with smooth animations and minimalistic design
- **Responsive Layout** that works on both iOS and Android
- **Bottom Sheets** for settings with a premium mobile app feel

### **Reading Experience:**
- **Customizable Reading Settings**: Font size, themes (Light/Sepia/Dark), line height
- **Page Navigation** with progress tracking
- **Distraction-Free Reading** with clean typography and proper spacing
- **Reading Progress** visualization with progress bars

### **Book Organization:**
- **Category Filtering** (Self-Development, Technology, Psychology, Environment, Philosophy)
- **Search & Discovery** with real-time filtering
- **Reading Status Tracking** (All Books, Currently Reading, Completed)
- **Book Metadata** including reading time, difficulty level, and tags

### **Sample Content:**
I've included 5 high-quality educational books covering:
- **"The Art of Learning"** by Josh Waitzkin (Self-Development)
- **"Digital Minimalism"** by Cal Newport (Technology) 
- **"The Science of Well-Being"** by Dr. Laurie Santos (Psychology)
- **"Sustainable Living Guide"** by Emma Green (Environment)
- **"Introduction to Philosophy"** by Prof. Michael Chen (Philosophy)

Each book contains substantial content (1000+ words) with proper chapter structure and educational value.

### **Technical Implementation:**
- **File-based Routing** with Expo Router
- **Custom Hooks** for book management and reading settings
- **TypeScript** for type safety
- **Responsive Components** that adapt to different screen sizes
- **Smooth Animations** and transitions throughout the app

The app provides a premium reading experience with educational content that's completely free and accessible. Users can discover books by category, customize their reading experience, and track their progress through an intuitive and beautiful interface.

The design follows modern mobile app principles with plenty of white space, clear typography, and intuitive navigation patterns that make reading enjoyable and distraction-free! 📚✨
